languages.text: {n}Вам становится очевидно, что какое решение не прими, оно выйдет вам боком. Однако есть способ извлечь выгоду: разрешить Сонму свершить самосуд, а затем обвинить фанатиков в нарушении древнего соглашения, запрещающего Экклезиархии иметь собственное войско — с последующей конфискацией имущества Сонма.{/n}

{n}You see clearly now that no matter what decision you make, it will backfire on you. However, there is a way to benefit from this: allow the Host to dispense their vigilante justice, then accuse the fanatics of violating an ancient agreement that forbade the Ecclesiarchy from having its own army, and proceed to confiscate the Host's property.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вам становится очевидно, что какое решение не прими, оно выйдет вам боком. Однако есть способ извлечь выгоду: разрешить Сонму свершить самосуд, а затем обвинить фанатиков в нарушении древнего соглашения, запрещающего Экклезиархии иметь собственное войско — с последующей конфискацией имущества Сонма.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dir ist klar, egal, welche Entscheidung du triffst, sie wird dir auf die Füße fallen. Allerdings gibt es einen Weg, aus der Angelegenheit einen Vorteil zu ziehen: Dulde die Selbstjustiz des Gastgebers und beschuldige die Fanatiker dann, gegen eine alte Vereinbarung verstoßen zu haben, wonach die Ekklesiarchie keine eigene Armee unterhalten darf. Anschließend konfiszierst du dann den Besitz des Kultes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see clearly now that no matter what decision you make, it will backfire on you. However, there is a way to benefit from this: allow the Host to dispense their vigilante justice, then accuse the fanatics of violating an ancient agreement that forbade the Ecclesiarchy from having its own army, and proceed to confiscate the Host's property.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dir ist klar, egal, welche Entscheidung du triffst, sie wird dir auf die Füße fallen. Allerdings gibt es einen Weg, aus der Angelegenheit einen Vorteil zu ziehen: Dulde die Selbstjustiz des Gastgebers und beschuldige die Fanatiker dann, gegen eine alte Vereinbarung verstoßen zu haben, wonach die Ekklesiarchie keine eigene Armee unterhalten darf. Anschließend konfiszierst du dann den Besitz des Kultes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous comprenez à présent que votre décision quelle qu'elle soit se retournera contre vous. Cependant, il y a bien un moyen de tirer parti de la situation : autoriser le Concile à poursuivre sa croisade, puis accuser les fanatiques de violer un ancien accord interdisant à l'Ecclésiarchie d'entretenir sa propre armée, avant de confisquer leurs biens.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see clearly now that no matter what decision you make, it will backfire on you. However, there is a way to benefit from this: allow the Host to dispense their vigilante justice, then accuse the fanatics of violating an ancient agreement that forbade the Ecclesiarchy from having its own army, and proceed to confiscate the Host's property.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous comprenez à présent que votre décision quelle qu'elle soit se retournera contre vous. Cependant, il y a bien un moyen de tirer parti de la situation : autoriser le Concile à poursuivre sa croisade, puis accuser les fanatiques de violer un ancien accord interdisant à l'Ecclésiarchie d'entretenir sa propre armée, avant de confisquer leurs biens.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你清楚地意识到，无论你做出什么样的决定，都只会让你蒙受损失。不过，有一种方法可以让你的王朝从中获益——你可以允许阴沉之主以他们的方式履行正义，之后指责那群狂热分子违背了国教“禁止拥有自己的军队”的古老法令，以此为由，没收阴沉之主的财产。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see clearly now that no matter what decision you make, it will backfire on you. However, there is a way to benefit from this: allow the Host to dispense their vigilante justice, then accuse the fanatics of violating an ancient agreement that forbade the Ecclesiarchy from having its own army, and proceed to confiscate the Host's property.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你清楚地意识到，无论你做出什么样的决定，都只会让你蒙受损失。不过，有一种方法可以让你的王朝从中获益——你可以允许阴沉之主以他们的方式履行正义，之后指责那群狂热分子违背了国教“禁止拥有自己的军队”的古老法令，以此为由，没收阴沉之主的财产。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eres consciente de que cualquier decisión que tomes tendrá consecuencias negativas para ti. No obstante, hay una forma de beneficiarse de esto: permitir que la Hueste se tome la justicia por su mano y después acusar a los fanáticos de violar un antiguo tratado que impide a la Eclesiarquía formar su propio ejército, lo que te permitiría confiscar sus propiedades.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see clearly now that no matter what decision you make, it will backfire on you. However, there is a way to benefit from this: allow the Host to dispense their vigilante justice, then accuse the fanatics of violating an ancient agreement that forbade the Ecclesiarchy from having its own army, and proceed to confiscate the Host's property.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eres consciente de que cualquier decisión que tomes tendrá consecuencias negativas para ti. No obstante, hay una forma de beneficiarse de esto: permitir que la Hueste se tome la justicia por su mano y después acusar a los fanáticos de violar un antiguo tratado que impide a la Eclesiarquía formar su propio ejército, lo que te permitiría confiscar sus propiedades.{/n}

languages.text: {n}どんな決断を下そうとも、それは必ず自分に跳ね返ってくるということを、今やあなたははっきりと理解している。だが、そこから利益を得る方法がひとつある。ドールフル・ホストに自警団的な正義を執行させた後で、帝国聖教会が独自の軍隊を持つことを禁じた古の協定に違反したとして狂信者たちを告発し、ドールフル・ホストの資産を押収することだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see clearly now that no matter what decision you make, it will backfire on you. However, there is a way to benefit from this: allow the Host to dispense their vigilante justice, then accuse the fanatics of violating an ancient agreement that forbade the Ecclesiarchy from having its own army, and proceed to confiscate the Host's property.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}どんな決断を下そうとも、それは必ず自分に跳ね返ってくるということを、今やあなたははっきりと理解している。だが、そこから利益を得る方法がひとつある。ドールフル・ホストに自警団的な正義を執行させた後で、帝国聖教会が独自の軍隊を持つことを禁じた古の協定に違反したとして狂信者たちを告発し、ドールフル・ホストの資産を押収することだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hangi kararı alırsan al ters tepeceği artık net bir şekilde ortada. Yine de bu durumdan kârlı çıkmak mümkün: Konakçı'nın kanunsuz adaletini sağlamasına müsaade et. Ardından fanatikleri, Ekleşiarşi'yi kendi ordusunu bulundurmaktan meneden kadim antlaşmayı bozmakla suçlayıp Konakçı'nın mülküne el koy.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see clearly now that no matter what decision you make, it will backfire on you. However, there is a way to benefit from this: allow the Host to dispense their vigilante justice, then accuse the fanatics of violating an ancient agreement that forbade the Ecclesiarchy from having its own army, and proceed to confiscate the Host's property.{/n}

Ardından fanatikleri; Ekleşiarşi'yi kendi ordusunu bulundurmaktan meneden kadim antlaşmayı bozmakla suçlayıp Konakçı'nın mülküne el koy.{/n}
